Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

Class MessageSet.Range

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.MessageSet.Range
  • Enclosing class:
    MessageSet
    public static final class MessageSet.Range
extends java.lang.Object
    A range within a message set.

    A range can be a single number (start == end), a numeric range, or include wildcards. Use MessageSet.WILDCARD for the * value.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Range

        public Range​(long start,
             long end)
        Creates a range.

        IMAP allows reverse ranges like 10:1; these are normalized to ascending order.

        Parameters:
        start - the start of the range, or MessageSet.WILDCARD
        end - the end of the range (inclusive), or MessageSet.WILDCARD

    • Method Detail

        Returns true if this is a single number (not a range).

        public boolean hasWildcard()
        Returns true if this range contains the wildcard.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(long number,
                        long lastNumber)
        Tests if this range contains the given number.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to test
        lastNumber - the value to use for wildcards (e.g., message count or max UID)
        Returns:
        true if the number is within this range
